effect.sword_shield: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.the_crown_tundra: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.legends_arceus: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.sword_shield: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
